title: Unprecedented iron-assisted room temperature synthesis of AgCN using acetonitrile
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10416-10421
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01790K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nand Kishor Gour, Manash J. Baruah, Biraj Das, Mukesh Sharma
A straightforward and convenient approach for producing AgCN at room temperature using acetonitrile as a source has been developed, employing various iron salts.
